subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt edged the swimmer Michael Phelps in a vote for the 2008 athlete of the year by the international news media. The pole-vault champion Yelena Isinbayeva took the top honor as sportswoman of the year, and Spain’s soccer team was voted team of the year for winning the European Championship.
